page.title: 16Star hamlet.
page.content: I live in Star which is a small hamlet.It has only nine livable houses.I live at one end of the hamlet in a house called Pendre.Pendre is Welsh for head of the village.The Ship which is a terraced house was once a public house and a chapel before they built the chapel on the hill.The Falls is a pub and next to it is the river Cneifa,which runs through the village and has lots of fish.There were three mills in Star in the past,a woollen mill and two grain mills.The Falls,which was the old wollen mill, still has its old water wheel in the stream.The water wheel was used to generate power for the mill.Bush Cottage,next door to us,used to be an old police station and a shop.It burned down some years ago and a new house was built on the site.Steven Thomas lives there now.
